statements: DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM clients WHERE financial_goal = 'Retirement' AND investment_preference = 'Low Risk';
DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_id = 101 AND client_age > 30;
DELETE FROM financial_data WHERE financial_goal = 'Retirement' OR investment_preferences LIKE '%Stocks%';
DELETE FROM financial_goals WHERE client_id = 100 AND goal_due_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Investment_Preferences WHERE advisor_id = 200 AND preference = 'Aggressive'
DELETE FROM Client_Information WHERE client_id = 12345 AND active = 0;
